com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class ScreenDensityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.ScreenDensityUtil

  • public final class ScreenDensityUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for computing scaled sizes for screen compatibility mode

    • Method Detail

      • computeCompatibleScaling

        public static float computeCompatibleScaling(Context context)
        Compute the scaling for applications runs under compatibility mode. This code is partially taken from CompatibilityInfo.java from the Android 5.0 source
        Parameters:
        context - Context in the screen to get the density of
        Returns:
        Returns the scaling factor for the window.

      • getRawScreenDim

        public static void getRawScreenDim(Context context,
                                   Point outSize)
        Determine the actual size of the screen in pixels. Inspired by http://stackoverflow.com/a/17512853/135135
        Parameters:
        context - context to get screen size of.
        outSize - Set to the real size of the display.
